name: Reac'this
description:
This is a low-poly puzzle game, made for Ludum Dare 49.

The theme of this jam was "Unstable". So I decided to make a game, where the reactor gets unstable, and you as the employee have to stop this!

Controls

WASD to move
E to interact
Mouse to look around
C to toggle checklist

Some Screenshots

Developer's Note

Unfortunately there are some small shadow issues, which I can't fix. So I added some native versions without this issue (Windows, Mac and Linux). Only Windows is tested, as I don't have any of the other OS.
